Vis Interface¶

class epyk.interfaces.graphs.CompChartsVis.Vis(context)¶
bar(record, y_columns=None, x_axis=None, profile=None, width=100, '%', height=330, 'px', options=None, htmlCode=None)¶

http://www.chartjs.org/

line(record, y_columns=None, x_axis=None, profile=None, width=100, '%', height=330, 'px', options=None, htmlCode=None)¶

Graph2d is an interactive visualization chart to draw data in a 2D graph. You can freely move and zoom in the graph by dragging and scrolling in the window.

Graph2d uses HTML DOM and SVG for rendering. This allows for flexible customization using css styling.

http://www.chartjs.org/ https://visjs.github.io/vis-timeline/examples/graph2d/16_bothAxisTitles.html

  • y_columns –

  • x_axis –

  • height –

  • htmlCode –
